title: [BUG] Tags not properly updated when updating run name in `SqlAlchemyStore`

labels.name: area/tracking
labels.description: Tracking service, tracking client APIs, autologging

labels.name: has-closing-pr
labels.description: This issue has a closing PR

body:
### Issues Policy acknowledgement

- [X] I have read and agree to submit bug reports in accordance with the [issues policy](https://www.github.com/mlflow/mlflow/blob/master/ISSUE_POLICY.md)

### Willingness to contribute

Yes. I would be willing to contribute a fix for this bug with guidance from the MLflow community.

### MLflow version

d38a78f8

### System information

- **OS Platform and Distribution (e.g., Linux Ubuntu 16.04)**: Windows 10
- **Python version**: 3.9
- **yarn version, if running the dev UI**:


### Describe the problem

related to #6932 and #7013 

When using postgresql as tracking uri, and when updating run name via `store.update_run_info()`, the `mlflow.user` is modified but not the expected `mlflow.runName`.

The problem does not occur for `FileStore`



### Tracking information

MLflow version: 1.29.1.dev0

### Code to reproduce issue

```python

import mlflow
from mlflow.tracking import MlflowClient
from mlflow.entities.run_status import RunStatus

if __name__ == "__main__":

    tracking_uri = "file:///C:/Users/gabrielfu/PycharmProjects/mlflow/mlruns"
    # tracking_uri = "postgresql+psycopg2://user:123456@localhost/mlflow_db"
    mlflow.set_tracking_uri(tracking_uri)
    print("Current tracking uri: {}".format(mlflow.get_tracking_uri()))

    # start a new run
    with mlflow.start_run() as run:
        run_id = run.info.run_id
        pass

    run = mlflow.get_run(run_id)
    print("before:")
    print("run:", run)
    print("==")

    def update(run_id, run_name):
        run = mlflow.get_run(run_id)
        client = MlflowClient()
        client._tracking_client.store.update_run_info(
            run_id=run_id,
            run_status=RunStatus.from_string(run.info.status),
            end_time=run.info.end_time,
            run_name=run_name,
        )

    update(run_id, "new_name")
    run = mlflow.get_run(run_id)
    print("after:")
    print("run:", run)
```

### Stack trace

### Running with FileStore
Output is as expected:
```
Current tracking uri: file:///C:/Users/gabrielfu/PycharmProjects/mlflow/mlruns
before:
run: <Run: data=<RunData: metrics={}, params={}, tags={'mlflow.runName': 'tasteful-dog-864',
 'mlflow.source.git.commit': '8d5d0a08c23383ef8b86c8fa67bdb12e4467304d',
 'mlflow.source.name': 'C:/Users/gabrielfu/PycharmProjects/mlflow/code/get_run.py',
 'mlflow.source.type': 'LOCAL',
 'mlflow.user': 'gabrielfu'}>, info=<RunInfo: artifact_uri='./mlruns/0/e7ee01bc1bb0411faca6b12ba394b1d2/artifacts', end_time=1665475081092, experiment_id='0', lifecycle_stage='active', run_id='e7ee01bc1bb0411faca6b12ba394b1d2', run_name='tasteful-dog-864', run_uuid='e7ee01bc1bb0411faca6b12ba394b1d2', start_time=1665475081052, status='FINISHED', user_id='gabrielfu'>>
==
after:
run: <Run: data=<RunData: metrics={}, params={}, tags={'mlflow.runName': 'new_name',
 'mlflow.source.git.commit': '8d5d0a08c23383ef8b86c8fa67bdb12e4467304d',
 'mlflow.source.name': 'C:/Users/gabrielfu/PycharmProjects/mlflow/code/get_run.py',
 'mlflow.source.type': 'LOCAL',
 'mlflow.user': 'gabrielfu'}>, info=<RunInfo: artifact_uri='./mlruns/0/e7ee01bc1bb0411faca6b12ba394b1d2/artifacts', end_time=1665475081092, experiment_id='0', lifecycle_stage='active', run_id='e7ee01bc1bb0411faca6b12ba394b1d2', run_name='new_name', run_uuid='e7ee01bc1bb0411faca6b12ba394b1d2', start_time=1665475081052, status='FINISHED', user_id='gabrielfu'>>
```

### Running with SqlAlchemyStore
If I change to `tracking_uri = "postgresql+psycopg2://user:123456@localhost/mlflow_db"`, then `mlflow.user` tag got changed but not `mlflow.runName`.
```
Current tracking uri: postgresql+psycopg2://user:123456@localhost/mlflow_db
before:
run: <Run: data=<RunData: metrics={}, params={}, tags={'mlflow.runName': 'fun-goat-459',
 'mlflow.source.git.commit': '8d5d0a08c23383ef8b86c8fa67bdb12e4467304d',
 'mlflow.source.name': 'C:/Users/gabrielfu/PycharmProjects/mlflow/code/get_run.py',
 'mlflow.source.type': 'LOCAL',
 'mlflow.user': 'gabrielfu'}>, info=<RunInfo: artifact_uri='./mlruns/0/b09a343ca34844288775f65462cb0352/artifacts', end_time=1665475607550, experiment_id='0', lifecycle_stage='active', run_id='b09a343ca34844288775f65462cb0352', run_name='fun-goat-459', run_uuid='b09a343ca34844288775f65462cb0352', start_time=1665475607522, status='FINISHED', user_id='gabrielfu'>>
==
after:
run: <Run: data=<RunData: metrics={}, params={}, tags={'mlflow.runName': 'fun-goat-459',
 'mlflow.source.git.commit': '8d5d0a08c23383ef8b86c8fa67bdb12e4467304d',
 'mlflow.source.name': 'C:/Users/gabrielfu/PycharmProjects/mlflow/code/get_run.py',
 'mlflow.source.type': 'LOCAL',
 'mlflow.user': 'new_name'}>, info=<RunInfo: artifact_uri='./mlruns/0/b09a343ca34844288775f65462cb0352/artifacts', end_time=1665475607550, experiment_id='0', lifecycle_stage='active', run_id='b09a343ca34844288775f65462cb0352', run_name='new_name', run_uuid='b09a343ca34844288775f65462cb0352', start_time=1665475607522, status='FINISHED', user_id='gabrielfu'>>
```

### Other info / logs

_No response_
